attributes.action: make non-residence parents pay more than the minimum £5 per week support if not working
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: these non-resident parents get away with not working and not supporting there child or children and this £5 per week gets spilt if this non-resident person has subsequent children.this is not fair on the parent who is trying to bring the child/ren up as £5 or less would hardly get a child/ren anything.so i think the child support needs to be adjusted to the childs/rens needs and circumstances
